name: Bee Friendly Wildflower Seeds
description: Beautifully designed and very high quality packets of hand-selected wild flower seeds that bees (and butterflies) will love. An ideal gift to pop into a card, an anniversary present or bought for yourself, this delightful selection of flowers will help to save our busy bees. Whether you live in the country or the city you can sow these seeds in gardens, window boxes or any open spaces. By doing this you'll be directly helping to save the bees by providing plants rich in pollen and nectar that these wonderful insects need to thrive. All our seeds are free from pesticides and insecticides and 100% British wildflower mix.

name: Butterfly-Friendly Wild Flower Seeds
description: Butterfly-Friendly Wild Flower Seeds. SOW IN SEPTEMBER FOR SPRING FLOWERING! Part of proceeds are donated to insect charities and organisations. Beautifully designed and very high quality packets of specially selected wild flower seeds that butterflies (and bees) will love. The seeds produce a delightful selection of wild flowers that will help to save our beautiful butterflies. Whether you live in the country or the city you can sow these seeds in gardens, window boxes or any open spaces. By doing this you'll be directly helping to save butterflies by providing plants rich in pollen and nectar that these wonderful insects need to thrive. All our seeds are free from pesticides and insecticides. These also make ideal gifts to pop into a card, offer as a wedding favour, an anniversary or valentine's present. What's in our packets? The mix of pollen and nectar rich flowers contains the following: Bird's Foot Trefoil, Field Scabious, Corncockle, Cornflower, Corn Poppy, Lady's Bedstraw, Common Knapweed, Ox-Eye Daisy, Red Campion, Musk Mallow. Sow seeds in Spring or Autumn for best results. They're easily sown - just thinly scatter over the area where you want them to grow and cover with a thin layer of soil. Keep them watered and they'll grow quickly and help the butterflies! We can also personalise the packets with a short message of your choice for bulk orders. Ideal if you're giving the seeds as a wedding favour, or for marking any special occasion. Contact us for details on personalisation. (Please note that we need a minimum of 10 days to produce bespoke items).

name: 'Bee Mine' Wildflower Seeds
description: Specially designed "Bee-Mine" Bee Friendly Wild Flower Seeds.  These are an ideal anniversary gift, love token or Valentine's gift. Beautifully designed and very high quality packets of wild flower seeds that bees (and butterflies) will love. Ideal to pop into a card, this delightful selection of flowers will help to save our busy bees. Whether you live in the country or the city you can sow these seeds in gardens, window boxes or any open spaces. By doing this you'll be directly helping to save the bees by providing plants rich in pollen and nectar that these wonderful insects need to thrive. All our seeds are free from pesticides and insecticides and a 100% British wildflower mix.

name: Duo Pack of Bee Friendly & Butterfly Friendly Wild Flower Seeds
description: Duo Pack of Bee and Butterfly Friendly Wild Flower Seeds. SOW IN SEPTEMBER FOR SPRING FLOWERING! Part of proceeds are donated to insect charities and organisations. A pack each of our beautifully designed and very high quality packets of specially selected wild flower seeds that butterflies and bees will love. The seeds produce a delightful selection of wild flowers that will help to save our beautiful insects. Whether you live in the country or the city you can sow these seeds in gardens, window boxes or any open spaces. By doing this you'll be directly helping to save the bees and butterflies by providing plants rich in pollen and nectar that these wonderful insects need to thrive. All our seeds are free from pesticides and insecticides. These also make ideal gifts to pop into a card, give as a Christmas gift, offer as a wedding favour, an anniversary or valentine's present. Sow seeds in Spring or Autumn for best results. They're easily sown - just thinly scatter over the area where you want them to grow and cover with a thin layer of soil. Keep them watered and they'll grow quickly and help the bees and butterflies! We can also personalise the packets with a short message of your choice for bulk orders. Ideal if you're giving the seeds as a wedding favour, or for marking any special occasion. Contact us for details on personalisation. (Please note that we need a minimum of 10 days to produce bespoke items).

name: Bee-Friendly 'Thank You' Wild Flower Seeds
description:
High quality seeds for flowers rich in nectar and pollen to help save our butterflies.
    A beautiful gift item, ideal to pop into a card as a Thank You gift
    Will grow in any outdoor space, great for window boxes and gardens.
    Delightful wild flowers that will brighten any garden. 2g per pack, will cover 1 m2
    Part of proceeds donated to insect and conservation organisations. All our seeds are pesticide and insecticide free and 100% British wild flowering mixture
